author: Anonymous Atom
title: Released Midterm 2 P5
question:
This question asks for a fn-composition of exactly 2 different build-in abstract functions. If I were to use length in addition to two built-in abstract functions. Would it be wrong? (since it would be a fn-composition of technically 3 functions(?))

For example: ( I know map is redundant in this case, just as an example)

(define (count-duplicates los1 los2)
(local [(define (count x)
1)
(define (in-both? x)
(ormap
(lambda (i) (string=? x i)) los2))]
(length (map count (filter in-both? los1)))))
